import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import i18next from 'i18next'; import { withTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; class Navbar extends Component { logOut(e) { localStorage.removeItem('usertoken') this.props.history.push('/') } render() { const { t } = this.props; function LanguageClick(lang) { i18next.changeLanguage(lang) } const loginRegLink = (
  • {t('about')} {/* about */}
    Technology media
  • Shops
  • Login
) const userLink = (
  • sell
  • crop risk
  • {/* weather */} weather
    hour Weekly Annaul
  • {/* discussion */} forum
    discussion my question
  • Profile
  • Logout
) return (
Agrolly
  • {/* {t("Home")} */} Home
{localStorage.usertoken ? userLink : loginRegLink}
  • {/* weather */} Language
); } } export default withRouter(Navbar)
